name: EYES (Shiro Sky)
description:
Follow the footsteps of a middle-aged man who has been rotten by time in his journey through his last moments before succumbing to madness. His indelible actions let chaos loose as his twisted memories shatter and cloud his clairvoyance: he is now inside a wall of flesh. The uncanny eyes represent his memories, quotes and wrongdoings and act as the final bringer of judgment.

In this point and click puzzler, you must use your cursor to interact with eyes and tinker your way to solutions.
Each eye has it's own mechanics so be on the look out, think outside of the box!
